title: Mahamrityunjay Mantra Jaap-Mala
description:
Front cover: http://us.st11.yimg.com/us.st.yimg.com/I/nehaflix_1992_58641941

Mahamrityunjay Mantra Jaap-Mala by Anuradha Paudwal in Sanskrit.
It is the finest presentation by Anuradha Paudwal. Her high pitch, sweet and melodious vocal has created magic and left impression.The sweet melodious journey of Anuradha Paudwa is accentuated in this album.

=====================

Om Tryambakam Yajamahe
Sugandhim Pushtivardhanam
Urvarukamiva Bandhanan
Mrityor Mukshiya Maamritat

=====================

Mahamrityunjaya Mantra is one of the more potent of the ancient Sanskrit mantras. Maha mrityunjaya is a call for enlightenment and is a practice of purifying the karmas of the soul at a deep level. It is also said to be quite beneficial for mental, emotional, and physical health.

=====================

REQEST:
If you have "Om Namah Shivay" by Anuradha Paudwal please write a comment and make a torrent. I&#039;d very much like to have it. Thanks!
